Sentencas: A Ni-YSZ (Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2) composite is commonly used as a solid oxide fuel cell anode.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The composite powders are usually synthesized by mixing NiO and YSZ powders.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The particle size and distribution of the two phases generally determine the performance of the anode.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Two different milling methods are used to prepare the composite anode powders, namely, high-energy milling and ball-milling that reduce the particle size.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The particle size and the Ni distribution of the two composite powders are examined.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The effects of milling on the performance are evaluated by using both an electrolyte-supported, symmetric Ni-YSZ/YSZ/Ni-YSZ cell and an anode-supported, asymmetric cell.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The performance is examined at 800 degrees C by impedance analysis and current-voltage measurements.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Pellets made by using high-energy milled NiO-YSZ powders have much smaller particle sizes and a more uniform distribution of Ni particles than pellets made from ball-milled powder, and thus the polarization resistance of the electrode is also smaller.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the anode-supported cell prepared by using the high-energy milled powder is similar to 850 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C compared with similar to 500 mW cm(-2) for the cell with ball-milled powder.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Thus, high-energy milling is found to be more effective in reducing particle size and obtaining a uniform distribution of Ni particles.
Titulo: Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell
Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell
Effect of milling methods on performance of Ni-Y2O3-stabilized ZrO2 anode for solid oxide fuel cell
